quotes.author: Why the Lucky Stiff
quotes.text: When you don't create things, you become defined by your tastes rather than ability. Your tastes only narrow and exclude people. So create

quotes.author: John Woods
quotes.text: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live

quotes.author: Rick Cook
quotes.text: Programming today is a race between Software Engineers striving to build bigger and better idiot-proof programs, and the Universe trying to produce bigger and better idiots. So far, the universe is winning

quotes.author: Ellen Ullman
quotes.text: We build our computer (systems) the way we build our cities: over time, without a plan, on top of ruins

quotes.author: Larry Niven
quotes.text: That's the thing about people who think they hate computers. What they really hate is lousy programmers

quotes.author: Waseem Latif
quotes.text: Give a man a program, frustrate him for a day. Teach him to program, frustrate him for a lifetime

quotes.author: Joseph Weizenbaum
quotes.text: The computer programmer is a creator of universes for which he alone is the lawgiver. No playwright, no stage director, no emperor, however powerful, has ever exercised such absolute authority to arrange a stage or field of battle and to command such unswervingly dutiful actors or troops

quotes.author: Fredrick Brooks
quotes.text: What one programmer can do in one month, two programmers can do in two months

quotes.author: Patrick McKenzie
quotes.text: Every great developer you know got there by solving problems they were unqualified to solve until they actually did it

quotes.author: Jeremy Keith
quotes.text: Java is to JavaScript as ham is to hamster

quotes.author: Chris Heilmann
quotes.text: Java is to JavaScript what Car is to Carpet

quotes.author: Oscar Godson
quotes.text: One of the best programming skills you can have is knowing when to walk away for a while

quotes.author: Dave Thomas
quotes.text: Write shy code - modules that don't reveal anything unnecessary to other modules and that don't rely on other modules' implementations

quotes.author: Ellen Ullman
quotes.text: Computer programming has always been a self-taught maverick occupation

quotes.author: Douglas Crockford
quotes.text: We like to think we spend our time power typing, but we actually spend most of our time starring into the abyss

quotes.author: Jason Fried
quotes.text: What something is called can suggest purpose. The more precise the word, the more intentionality there is behind it

quotes.author: Frank Lord Wright
quotes.text: You can use an eraser on the drafting table or a sledgehammer on the construction site

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: When you don't create things, you become defined by your tastes rather than ability. Your tastes only narrow and exclude people. So create

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: You can use an eraser on the drafting table or a sledgehammer on the construction site

quotes.author: Martin Fowler
quotes.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand

quotes.author: Martin Fowler
quotes.text: I'm not a great programmer; I'm just a good programmer with great habits

quotes.author: Martin Fowler
quotes.text: If you can get today's work done today, but you do it in such a way that you can't possibly get tomorrow's work done tomorrow, then you lose

quotes.author: Martin Fowler
quotes.text: In almost all cases, I'm opposed to setting aside time for refactoring. In my view, refactoring is not an activity you set aside time to do. Refactoring is something you do all the time in little bursts

quotes.author: Martin Fowler
quotes.text: It takes a while to create nothing

quotes.author: Martin Fowler
quotes.text: Poorly designed code usually takes more code to do the same things, often because the code quite literally does the same thing in several places

quotes.author: Martin Fowler
quotes.text: Whenever I have to think to understand what the code is doing, I ask myself if i can refactor the code to make that understanding more immediately apparent

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: It is not enough for the code to work

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: Indeed, the ratio of time spent reading versus writing is well over 10 to 1. We are constantly reading old code as part of the effort to write new code... [Therefore,] making it easy to read makes it easier to write

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: Truth can only be found in one place: the code

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: So if you want to go fast, if you want to get done quickly, if you want your code to be easy to write, make it easier to read

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: If you're good at the debugger, it means you spent a lot of time debugging. I don't want you to be good at the debugger

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: A long descriptive name is better than a short enigmatic name. A long descriptive name is better than a long descriptive comment

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: You should name a variable with the same care with which you name your first-born child

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: It is not the language that makes programs appear simple. It is the programmer that makes the language appear simple

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: Of course bad code can be cleaned up. But it is very expensive

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: Programming is a social activity

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: Clean code always looks like it was written by someone who cares

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: Redundant comments are just places to collect lies and misinformation

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: Writing clean code is what you must do in order to call yourself a professional. There is no reasonable excuse for doing anything less than your best

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: If you are tired or distracted, do not code

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: Honesty in small things is not a small thing

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: Creative output depends on creative input

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.text: Talk is cheap. Show me the code

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.text: Theory and practice sometimes clash. And when that happens, theory loses. Every single time

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.text: I like offending people, because I think people who get offended should be offended

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.text: Intelligence is the ability to avoid doing work, yet getting the work done

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.text: Those that can, do. Those that can't, complain

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.text: By staying neutral, I end up being somebody that everybody can trust. Even if they don't always agree with my decisions, they know I'm not working against them

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.text: People who are doing things for fun do things the right way by themselves

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.text: Don't hurry your code. Make sure it works well and is well designed. Don't worry about timing

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.text: Programmers are in the enviable position of not only getting to do what they want to, but because the end result is so important they get paid to do it. There are other professions like that, but not that many

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.text: If you start doing things because you hate others and want to screw them over, the end result is bad

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.text: In many cases the user interface to a program is the most important part for a commercial company: whether the programs works correctly or not seems to be secondary

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.text: The fact is, there aren't just two sides to any issue, there's almost always a range of responses, and "it depends" is almost always the right answer in any big question

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.text: To be honest, the fact that people trust you gives you a lot of power over people. Having another person's trust is more powerful than all other management techniques put together

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.text: I choose a lazy person to do a hard job. Because a lazy person will find an easy way to do it

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.text: I am not in competition with anyone but myself. My goal is to improve myself continuously

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.text: Success today requires the agility and drive to constantly rethink, reinvigorate, react, and reinvent

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.text: Vision without execution is daydreaming

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.text: Vision without execution is daydreaming

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.text: If your goal is to make the world a better place, one thing you can do is pick a specific challenge that you really care about. Then, learn as much as you can about it and try to volunteer your time to help an organization that is working in this area. While you're doing that, look for creative new ways to use technology to tackle parts of the problem that you come in contact with

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.text: Leaders are those who empower others

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.text: Look at the clock when you are sitting idle. But never look at the clock when you are working

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.text: The world won't care about your self-esteem. The world will expect you to accomplish something BEFORE you feel good about yourself

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.text: You can make money and you can make excuses, but you can never make money out of excuses

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.text: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.text: Most people overestimate what they can do in one year and underestimate what they can do in ten years
